name: Space Demolisher
description:
A space-themed infinite runner gaming project that is enhanced by power-ups. Do you have what it takes to survive in immeasurable space?

The game is developed for the annual Tech Fest of our college, Symbiosis Institute of Technology.

Controls

For Windows:
WASD/ARROW KEYS/LEFT JOYSTICK - FOR MOVEMENT
LEFT CTRL/SPACEBAR/LMB - FOR SHOOTING
